Html:
A few minor corrections for your readme.txt file:

  • "Once you got those put in" --> "Once you have your API keys"
  • "know the vistual path" --> "know the virtual path"
  • "Intgrated Visual Studio Web Server" --> "Integrated Visual Studio Web Server"

Looking forward to using your project! Thanks.

Dave Mackey.

Thank you @davidshq for the correction.

I'll update the readme.txt to reflect that

Glad I can be of assistance. Hopefully as time goes on I can be of more substantive assistance! :)

Dave.
